summary: A man screws up on a transcontinental level in a noble effort to win back "the one."
cast: Simon Helberg|Melanie Lynskey|Zachary Quinto|Judith Light|Maggie Grace|Alfred Molina|Jason Ritter|Meredith Hagner|Geoffrey Cantor|Dana Ivey|Jamil Mena|Lizan Mitchell|Ebon Moss-Bachrach|Fritz Weaver|Dennis Carter Jr.|Jiana Casazza|Lauren DelGiudice|Dante DiGiorgio|Gioianna DiGiorgio|Karen Goeller|Stan Vidal|Richard Bird|Shaquanda Cox|Holly Galloway|Andrew Hunt Gordon|Nancy Marlowe Gordon|Chloe Himmelman|Kenneth Kopolovicz|Lovari|Zachary Mecier|Steve Mellor|Hannah Robinson|Joseph Scarpino
title: We'll Never Have Paris
